dcterms:description: A dataset designed for machine comprehension of text, containing 100,000+ questions for evaluating reading comprehension systems.
dcterms:title: Stanford Question Answering Dataset (SQuAD)

dcterms:description: A human-generated dataset for machine reading comprehension, designed to evaluate the ability of models to read and understand text.
dcterms:title: Microsoft Machine Reading Comprehension Dataset (MS-MARCO)

dcterms:creator: Simon Ostermann

dcterms:description: A task dataset focused on machine comprehension using commonsense knowledge, designed to evaluate the ability of models to understand and answer questions based on narrative documents.
dcterms:title: Machine Comprehension using Commonsense Knowledge task
